context: This criteria evaluates the engineer's proficiency in using the @emoji-toolkit/size package to build a message board generator. It focuses on correct usage of emoji scaling functions, geometric pattern generators, progress bar creation, and text processing functions.

checklist.name: Grid Pattern Creation
checklist.description: Uses createGrid() to generate the top border with correct parameters (1 row, 15 columns, decoration emoji)

checklist.name: Title Emoji Scaling
checklist.description: Uses scaleAllEmojis() to scale emojis in the title text based on importance ranges, correctly mapping importance values to appropriate EmojiSize types ('tiny', 'small', 'medium', 'large')

checklist.name: Progress Bar Implementation
checklist.description: Uses createProgressBar() with correct parameters: fill emoji ('●'), empty emoji ('○'), importance value as progress (0-1), and length of 12 segments

checklist.name: Message Emoji Scaling
checklist.description: Uses scaleAllEmojis() to scale all emojis in message strings to 'medium' size while preserving non-emoji text content

checklist.name: Conditional Shape Generation
checklist.description: Correctly implements conditional logic to generate different bottom decorations: createDiamond() with size 3 for importance >= 0.75, createPyramid() with height 2 for importance 0.5-0.74, or repeatEmoji() with count 3 and space separator for importance < 0.5

checklist.name: Function Selection
checklist.description: Uses the appropriate @emoji-toolkit/size functions throughout rather than manual string manipulation or repetition for emoji operations
